A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Felt like a Harry Potter movie. Overloaded\, boring\, and incomplete. A lot happening\, yet nothing happening\, and it's mostly boring till the end. Didn't like any new character. Didn't like the new locations. Didn't like the old characters.
No payoff from Force Awakens. Some great moments with Rey and Kylo\, but not so much with Luke and Rey or with Luke and Leia.
The animated series is better. The comics are better. This was a let down.
Can't deliver at this low level after we've had space epics like Thor Ragnarok\, Guardians of the Galaxy\, and Star Trek Beyond that are better defined and better developed.
